subject.description: Young woman with a soft, alluring expression
subject.hair: Long, wavy, platinum silver or ash blonde hair, styled with a large rectangular pearl hair clip on the side
subject.skin: Fair complexion with visible natural texture and light freckles
subject.eyes: Gazing directly at the camera, soft and dreamy

apparel.outfit: Pale peach or soft pink sundress with subtle vertical stripes
apparel.details: Sweetheart neckline, thick straps, textured linen or cotton fabric, fitted bodice

pose.arms: Right arm bent upwards with hand resting near the head/hair, framing the face; left arm resting gently on the bed
pose.angle: Overhead or slightly high-angle shot looking down at the subject

environment.foreground: Bed with a beige and white gingham (checkered) duvet or sheet
environment.background: Blurred white French windows or balcony doors allowing natural light to enter

lighting.type: Natural window light (Golden Hour or bright morning)
lighting.effects: Dappled sunlight creating soft, geometric shadow patterns across the bed and the subject's body, high contrast between light and shadow

camera_settings.aperture: f/1.8 to f/2.8 (Shallow depth of field with creamy bokeh in the background)
camera_settings.focus: Sharp focus on the face and eyes
